summary: During a turbulent time when politics, rebellion, and invasion come to a head. A clash stirs between two swordsmen in a violent struggle to seize control of the country they love.
cast: Jung-min Hwang|Seung-Won Cha|Ji-hye Han|Sung-Hyun Baek|Kim Chang-wan|Young-chang Song|Jeong Gyu-Su|Shin Jeong-geun|Seung-ryong Ryu|Hae-yeong Lee|Yang Yeong-jo|Yun-ho Park|Yeong-seok Lee|Bo-yeon Kim|Sang-ho Kim|Dong-heon Yeom|Dal-Hyeong Lee|Dae-Sung Choi|Seung-do Han|Dae-byeong Jeon|Il-Joo Ji|Kyeong-hun Jo|Hyun Joong Kang|Ji-eun Kim|Min-su Kim|Seong-hoon Kim|Jae-goo Lee|Seol-gu Lee|Seung-won Seo|Chang-gon Song|Yeong-geol Yun
keywords: based on graphic novel|based on comic book|based on comic|martial arts
title: Goo-reu-meul beo-eo-nan dal-cheo-reom
